All players and their rankings for each game they play

{{player.gameName}} | {{player.firstName}} {{player.lastName}} | {{player.player_score}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LeaderboardService } from '../leaderboard.service'; import { TopPlayerByGame } from '../types'; @Component({ selector: 'app-q5', templateUrl: './q5.component.html', styleUrls: ['./q5.component.css'] }) export class Q5Component implements OnInit{ TopPlayerByGames: TopPlayerByGame[] = []; constructor( private leaderboardService: LeaderboardService, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.leaderboardService.getTopPlayer() .subscribe(TopPlayerByGames => this.TopPlayerByGames = TopPlayerByGames); } }
